CSSTransformValue.summary: The CSSTransformValue interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents transform-list values as used by the CSS 'transform' property.

CSSTransformValueCSSTransformValue.summary:
The CSSTransformValue() constructor
creates a new object which represents a list of
individual transform objects.

CSSTransformValueEntries.summary:
The CSSTransformValue.entries() method
returns an array of a given object's own enumerable
property [key, value] pairs in the same order as that provided by a
for...in loop (the difference being that a for-in loop enumerates
properties in the prototype chain as well).
CSSTransformValueEntries.returns:
An array of the given CSSTransformValue object's own enumerable property
[key, value] pairs.

CSSTransformValueForEach.summary: The CSSTransformValue.forEach() method executes a provided function once for each element of the CSSTransformValue.

CSSTransformValueIs2D.summary:
The read-only is2D property of the
interface returns whether the transform is 2D or 3D.

remarks.para:
In the case of the CSSTransformValue this property returns
true unless any of the individual functions return false for Is2D, in which
case it returns false.

CSSTransformValueIs2D.value:
A boolean. True indicates that the transform is a 2D transform, false that it is a 3D
transform.

CSSTransformValueKeys.summary:
The CSSTransformValue.keys() method
returns a new array iterator object that contains the keys
for each index in the array.

CSSTransformValueLength.summary:
The read-only length property of the
interface returns the number of transform components in
the list.
CSSTransformValueLength.value: An integer representing the number of transform components in the list.

CSSTransformValueToMatrix.summary:
The toMatrix() method of the
interface returns a object.

CSSTransformValueValues.summary:
The CSSTransformValue.values() returns a
new array iterator object that contains the values for
each index in the CSSTransformValue object.
